.. _contact:

=======
Contact
=======

Mailing list
============

.. index:: mailing lists; pago-users@groupes.renater.fr

You can share your user experiment with |pago| community be sending an email
to pago-users@groupes.renater.fr mailing list.

Moderation is set for non members on this list to avoid spams.

Join this list by send an email to sympa@groupes.renater.fr
with this following subject:

:samp:`subscribe pago-users {Firstname} {Lastname}`

Archives are accessible to members only.
